Topic: Draw a string telephone between two students.
Evidence Statements: The student can draw a device that uses sound to solve the problem of communicating over a distance.
The student can illustrate how the device connects two students so they can send and receive information.
The student can show, using drawings, what materials are used to create the string telephone.
The student can illustrate that the string telephone allows communication between students who are far apart.
The student can include labels or symbols in the drawing to indicate how sound travels through the string to communicate messages.
